name: Lords Of The Lockerroom
description:
In this 3D physics based "fighter", take control of Aniki, Kazuya, Obama, and the rest of the cast as you duke it out in famous gachimuchi locations to see who's really the boss the gym! Play together with your boy next door in local split-screen co-op! Beat 'em up 1, 2 ,3!

Game will be continuously updated based on player feedback so please contact us on Twitter for suggestions!

Nickireda - Developer, Programmer, Designer, Additional Models
Sun Oh - UI Sketches, Button Art
Portizoa - Obama Model
DariusSheeno - UI Assets, UI Mockups
Vol Wright X - Logo / Icon Billy Art
BowlRoll - Character Models, Locker Room Model
Kobayashi’s Ego - Trailer
